---
id: get-ticket-followers
title: "Get ticket followers"
description: "Retrieves the list of users following a ticket. Followers receive notifications about ticket updates."
sidebar_label: "Get ticket followers"

---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get ticket followers"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/followers"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the list of users following a ticket. Followers receive notifications about ticket updates.

**Related Endpoints**
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/user/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-user) – Add a user follower
- [DELETE /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/user/\{userId\}](/docs/api/tickets/remove-ticket-follower-user) – Remove a user follower
- [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/followers/team/\{teamId\}](/docs/api/tickets/add-ticket-follower-team) – Add a team as followers

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
